description:
Verbeck and Glover bring the black ships to attack Japan once more.  They have far more ships than they did last time, and Nagasaki is in grave danger.  Shigeyoshi Hitotsubashi`s Takemikedzuchi destroys them in a single strike.  Kei`ichirou tries to stand against him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Led by the Onigami, to Share Our Fate!
Les onigami pour guides, des destinées opposées !
鬼神導きて, 運命を別つ!
